00022 #ifndef SPFREADER_H
00023 #define SPFREADER_H
00024 
00025 //
00026 #include "calvin_files/fusion/src/FusionCELData.h"
00027 #include "chipstream/CumulativeStats.h"
00028 #include "chipstream/ProbeListFactory.h"
00029 #include "chipstream/ProbeSet.h"

00036 #include <map>
00037 #include <set>
00038 #include <string>
00039 #include <vector>
00040 
00041 /**
00042  * Class for parsing the Simple Probe Format (SPF) text files. Reads
00043  * one record at a time to ease memory requirements
00044  */
00045 class SpfReader {
00046 
00047 public:
00048 
00049 /** Open a text file for reading. */
00050 void openSpf(const std::string &fileName);
00051 
00052 /** Destructor to cleanup open files. */
00053 ~SpfReader() {
00054 m_IncrementalIn.close();
00055 }
00056 
00057 /** Read the next record. Returned probeset must be deleted by
00058     caller */
00059 ProbeSet *readNextProbeSet();
00060 
00061 bool isFileOpen() {
00062 return m_IncrementalIn.is_open();
00063 }
00064 
00065 int getNumProbeSets() {
00066   std::string numPSetsString;
00067   m_IncrementalIn.getHeader("num-probesets", numPSetsString);
00068   return Convert::toInt(numPSetsString.c_str());
00069 }
00070 
00071 
00072 private:
00073 
00074 /* Read probeset from our buffers */
00075 ProbeSet *readProbeSetRecord(std::string &name, int type, int numBlocks, std::string &blockSizesStr,
00076                              std::string &blockAnnsStr, int numMatch, int numProbes, std::string &probesStr,
00077                              int lineNumber);
00078 
00079 /** Utility function to convert string to vector. */
00080 void chopToIntVector(const std::string &s, char delim, std::vector<int> &vec);
00081 /// Datafile to read in
00082 affx::TsvFile m_IncrementalIn;
00083 /// Buffers to read into
00084 std::string m_IncName, m_IncBlockSizesStr, m_IncBlockAnnsStr, m_IncProbesStr;
00085 int m_IncType, m_IncNumBlocks, m_IncNumMatch, m_IncNumProbes;
00086 
00087 };
00088 
00089 #endif
